About the Company: ARSS Infrastructure Projects Ltd is engaged in construction activities in India.The company undertakes construction of railway infrastructure, roads, highways, bridges and irrigation projects. Their clients include Ministry of Railways, State Government of Orissa, Rail Vikas Nigam Limited, RITES Limited, IRCON International Limited, National Thermal Power Corporation, Hindustan Steel Corporation Limited, PWD - Orissa, IOCL, National Highway Authority of India, Vendata, Nalco, Jindal Steel & Power Limited, etc.
